languages.text: "Плоть и кровь могут даровать откровения, но не таким путем. Поедание плоти — нечистое деяние". {n}Кибелла неодобрительно смотрит в отверзтый мозг, в котором пульсирует голубая жилка.{/n} "Не так подобает служить Неумирающему".

traits.locale_text: "Плоть и кровь могут даровать откровения, но не таким путем. Поедание плоти — нечистое деяние". {n}Кибелла неодобрительно смотрит в отверзтый мозг, в котором пульсирует голубая жилка.{/n} "Не так подобает служить Неумирающему".

languages.text: "Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."
languages.original_text: "Плоть и кровь могут даровать откровения, но не таким путем. Поедание плоти — нечистое деяние". {n}Кибелла неодобрительно смотрит в отверзтый мозг, в котором пульсирует голубая жилка.{/n} "Не так подобает служить Неумирающему".

traits.locale_text: "Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

"Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

"Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

"Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

"Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

"Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

"Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

languages.text: «La carne y la sangre pueden conceder revelaciones, pero no de esta manera. Devorar la carne es un acto profano». {n}Kibellah mira con desaprobación el cerebro abierto y la vena azul palpitante en su interior.{/n} «Esta no es forma de servir al Inmortal».
languages.original_text: "Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: «La carne y la sangre pueden conceder revelaciones, pero no de esta manera. Devorar la carne es un acto profano». {n}Kibellah mira con desaprobación el cerebro abierto y la vena azul palpitante en su interior.{/n} «Esta no es forma de servir al Inmortal».

languages.text: 「肉と血は啓示を与えることができますが、こんな風にはできません。肉をむさぼるのは冒涜的な行為です」{n}キベラは開かれた脳と、その中で脈打つ青い血管を不服げに見ている。{/n}「このような方法で不死の者に仕えてはいけません」
languages.original_text: "Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: 「肉と血は啓示を与えることができますが、こんな風にはできません。肉をむさぼるのは冒涜的な行為です」{n}キベラは開かれた脳と、その中で脈打つ青い血管を不服げに見ている。{/n}「このような方法で不死の者に仕えてはいけません」

languages.text: “血肉确实可以带来启示，但并不是以这种方式。吞食肉体是亵渎的恶行。”{n}绮贝菈不满地看着被挖开的大脑，盯着大脑中不断脉动的蓝色静脉。{/n}“这并不是侍奉不死之神的方式。”
languages.original_text: "Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: “血肉确实可以带来启示，但并不是以这种方式。吞食肉体是亵渎的恶行。”{n}绮贝菈不满地看着被挖开的大脑，盯着大脑中不断脉动的蓝色静脉。{/n}“这并不是侍奉不死之神的方式。”

languages.text: "Fleisch und Blut können Offenbarungen gewähren, aber nicht so. Fleisch zu verschlingen, ist gottlos." {n}Kibellah betrachtet missbilligend das freiliegende Gehirn und die darin pulsierende blaue Ader.{/n} "Das ist keine Art, dem Todlosen zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: "Fleisch und Blut können Offenbarungen gewähren, aber nicht so. Fleisch zu verschlingen, ist gottlos." {n}Kibellah betrachtet missbilligend das freiliegende Gehirn und die darin pulsierende blaue Ader.{/n} "Das ist keine Art, dem Todlosen zu dienen."

languages.text: « Il est vrai que la chair et le sang peuvent être source de révélations, mais pas de cette manière. Manger de la chair est un acte impie. » {n}Kibellah regarde avec désapprobation le cerveau à nu et la veine bleue qui palpite.{/n} « Ce n'est pas ainsi que l'on sert l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: "Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: « Il est vrai que la chair et le sang peuvent être source de révélations, mais pas de cette manière. Manger de la chair est un acte impie. » {n}Kibellah regarde avec désapprobation le cerveau à nu et la veine bleue qui palpite.{/n} « Ce n'est pas ainsi que l'on sert l'Immortel. »

languages.text: "Et ve kandan kehanetler okunabilir ancak bu şekilde değil. Eti yemek, günahkâr bir eylemdir." {n}Kibellah, açıkta duran beyne ve içinde nabız gibi atan mavi damara onaylamayan bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Ölmeyen'e hizmet etmenin yolu bu değildir."
languages.original_text: "Flesh and blood can grant revelations, but not like this. Devouring flesh is a profane act." {n}Kibellah looks with disapproval at the open brain and the pulsing blue vein within.{/n} "This is not the way to serve the Undying One."
